dict.acceptation: 缺少；应该；打算；需要…在场；
缺乏；需要的东西；贫穷；贫困；

sent.orig: I don't want there to be any doubt about this.
sent.trans: （不定式短语作动词want的宾语）我不希望对此有任何怀疑。

sent.orig: Listen and practice. Note the pronunciation of want + to.
sent.trans: 听一听，练一练。注意want + to的发音。

sent.orig: Simon:You want to win, you want to prove a point, and you want to entertain.
sent.trans: 你想要赢，你想要用行动证明你的能力，你渴望娱乐！

sent.orig: I want good. I want a great meal. I want the best food around.
sent.trans: 我想吃好的东西。我想好好吃一顿。我想要吃附近最好的食物。

sent.orig: I want adventures, I want hang out, I want Chandler.
sent.trans: 我希望冒险，我希望随心所欲，我希望有钱德。
